DOC.brief_summary: - This observational study . Respiratory data record use Capnostream20p . There use record data medical care patient . Other clinical data capture CRF . Similar study currently conduct Bnai Zion MC since 2008 . Thirty four ( 34 ) patient recruit without adverse event . - During study medical team capture CRF following : Blood gas distal capnography value time sampling , ventilator setting time sample . - Changes make ventilation parameter , blood gas time result , concomitant treatment ( e.g . suction ) concomitant medication ( respiratory relate e.g . surfactant ) , vital sign retrieve patient 's medical chart .
DOC.brief_title: Capnography Neonates Ventilated With High Frequency Ventilation : Prospective , Observational Multi-Center Study
DOC.criteria: Intubated neonate doublelumen ETT ( Uncuffed Tracheal Tube , Mallinckrodt Inc. , Chih , Mexico ) Neonates respiratory condition require HFV Neonates expect least 3 pair distal capnography measurement blood gas sampling . Intubated neonate singlelumen ETTs Neonates ventilate conventional ventilation Any significant medical condition , investigator 's discretion , may interfere study .
